page.title: 06Gringley Primary School Cont
page.content: {Curriculum:}English lang./literature, reading,poetry,drama,comprehension, interviewing.Maths:Four Rules,problem -solving,computer & calculator skills. Topic Work:incl. Geog.,Hist.,Science, Environmental Studies.R.I:Father Baker instructs all age groups & takes morning assemblies (Mon & Thurs)Church Service held at end of each term. School relies heavily on parental involvement for help with art,craft, sewing,baking,gardening,concerts (at Christmas & Summer) & with transport for visits & games fixtures.Also Detention Centre Gym used for Saturday morning football training organised by a group of fathers. {P.T.A.}Active in functions & fund- raising for school and village eg. Country Show (Sept),Ceilidh(Mar), Beetle Drives,Bingo & Raffles.Gives gift of a book to each school leaver.
